jobTitle: Systems Analyst - banking, data mapping, FRDs, SQL, web apps
jobDescription: Job Description: Client in need of business systems analysts who have written BRDs and functional requirements/specs for web applications. Must have data mapping, SQL, Agile, banking, and web service/API mapping.  Required Skills: SQL; DATA MAPPING, WEB APPLICATIONS; BANKING, WEB SERVICE/API MAPPING, AGILE.  Don't hesitate! Submit your resume today.  SMCI is an EEO employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, age, genetic information, marital status, military, and veteran status. Members of minority groups, Vietnam Era Veterans and individuals with mental or physical disabilities are encouraged to contact us regarding employment opportunities. In addition, in order to support the provision of business to minority-owned and Women-owned businesses (MWBE), such MWBE are encouraged to contact us regarding subcontracting business opportunities with our firm.  (No third parties, please)  (H1 sponsorship currently unavailable) - provided by Dice  banking, data mapping, FRDs, SQL, web apps
